trans-unit.source: Class '<classname>' must declare a 'Sub New' because its base class '<classname2>' does not have an accessible 'Sub New' that can be called with no arguments | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: La clase<classname>' debe declarar un 'Sub New' porque su clase base<classname2>' no tiene un 'Sub New' accesible que se puede llamar sin argumentos | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Class '<classname>' must declare a 'Sub New' because its base class '<classname2>' does not have an accessible 'Sub New' that can be called with no arguments
trans-unit.target: La clase<classname>' debe declarar un 'Sub New' porque su clase base<classname2>' no tiene un 'Sub New' accesible que se puede llamar sin argumentos

trans-unit.source: A derived class does not declare a constructor, and [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] cannot generate one because there is no base class constructor it can call.
trans-unit.target: Una clase derivada no declara un constructor y [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] no se puede generar uno porque no hay ningún constructor de clase base que se puede llamar.

trans-unit.source: When a derived class does not declare a constructor, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] attempts to generate an implicit parameterless constructor that calls `MyBase.New()`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando una clase derivada no declara un constructor, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] intenta generar un constructor sin parámetros implícito que llama a `MyBase.New()`.

trans-unit.source: If there is no accessible constructor in the base class that can be called without arguments, or if there is more than one, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] cannot generate an implicit constructor.
trans-unit.target: Si no hay ningún constructor accesible en la clase base que se puede llamar sin argumentos, o si hay más de uno, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] no se puede generar un constructor implícito.

trans-unit.source: Declare and implement at least one `Sub New` constructor somewhere in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Declare e implemente al menos un constructor `Sub New` en algún lugar de la clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: Add a call to a base class constructor, `MyBase.New()`, as the first line of every `Sub New`.
trans-unit.target: Agregue una llamada a un constructor de clase base, `MyBase.New()`, como la primera línea de cada `Sub New`.

trans-unit.source: [Object Lifetime: How Objects Are Created and Destroyed](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/objects-and-classes/object-lifetime-how-objects-are-created-and-destroyed.md)
trans-unit.target: [Duración de los objetos: Cómo se crean y destruyen](../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/objects-and-classes/object-lifetime-how-objects-are-created-and-destroyed.md)
